channel.title: Team on Project RED

item.title: 1 - Mohan
item.description: Mohan is an Electrical and Systems engineer with over 20 years of experience designing electronics for a wide variety of markets and applications, including optical networking, robotics, medical devices, space systems, scientific equipment, and more.
